item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

About Kaspar Rufibach has received training as a mathematical statistician. Through more than 15 years in various biostatistical roles he has complemented his thorough theoretical background with expertise in biostatistics. He is passionate about applying this expertise to solve problems in pharmaceutical drug development. I’m always up for collaboration. Send me an email if you’re interested! Are you interested in situational and spatial criminology? Consider joining the â€˜Space, Place, and Crimeâ€™ working group of the European Society of Criminology.

item.title: Software
item.description: When I think it may be helpful to others, I publish my code as a software package. So far, I have published two R packages on Github:
